languages.text: Даргонус был подвергнут чудовищному разграблению, миллионы были преданы смерти, кровь затопила ульи. Когда сокровища фон Валанциусов были похищены, обитель предател{mf|я|ьницы} Человечества была разбомблена с орбиты циклонными торпедами. Некогда славный мир погиб.

Dargonus was subjected to horrific pillaging, millions were put to death, and blood ran through the streets. After the von Valancius treasures were stolen, the abode of the traitor to Humanity was bombed with cyclonic torpedoes from orbit. The once glorious world was lost.
languages.original_text: Даргонус был подвергнут чудовищному разграблению, миллионы были преданы смерти, кровь затопила ульи. Когда сокровища фон Валанциусов были похищены, обитель предател{mf|я|ьницы} Человечества была разбомблена с орбиты циклонными торпедами. Некогда славный мир погиб.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus was subjected to a horrific pillage, millions were put to death, blood flooded the streets. After the von Valancius treasures were stolen, the abode of the traitor to Humanity was bombed with cyclonic torpedoes from orbit. A once glorious world was lost.

Dargonus was subjected to a horrific pillage, millions were put to death, blood flooded the streets. After the von Valancius treasures were stolen, the abode of the traitor to Humanity was bombed with cyclonic torpedoes from orbit. A once glorious world was lost.

Dargonus was subjected to horrific pillaging, millions were put to death, and blood ran through the streets. After the von Valancius treasures were stolen, the abode of the traitor to Humanity was bombed with cyclonic torpedoes from orbit. The once glorious world was lost.

Dargonus was subjected to horrific pillaging, millions were put to death, and blood ran through the streets. After the von Valancius treasures were stolen, the abode of the traitor to Humanity was bombed with cyclonic torpedoes from orbit. The once glorious world was lost.

Dargonus was subjected to horrific pillaging, millions were put to death, and blood ran through the streets. After the von Valancius treasures were stolen, the abode of the traitor to Humanity was bombed with cyclonic torpedoes from orbit. The once glorious world was lost.

languages.text: 达戈努斯遭到了可怕的掠夺，几百万人遭到杀害，整座城市流血漂橹。当冯·瓦兰修斯家族的宝藏失窃之后，帝国海军从轨道上发射了旋风鱼雷，将人类叛徒所在的所在之处彻底摧毁。这个曾经一度辉煌的世界最终灰飞烟灭。
languages.original_text: Dargonus was subjected to horrific pillaging, millions were put to death, and blood ran through the streets. After the von Valancius treasures were stolen, the abode of the traitor to Humanity was bombed with cyclonic torpedoes from orbit. The once glorious world was lost.

traits.locale_text: 达戈努斯遭到了可怕的掠夺，几百万人遭到杀害，整座城市流血漂橹。当冯·瓦兰修斯家族的宝藏失窃之后，帝国海军从轨道上发射了旋风鱼雷，将人类叛徒所在的所在之处彻底摧毁。这个曾经一度辉煌的世界最终灰飞烟灭。

languages.text: ダルゴナスは恐ろしい略奪に見舞われていた。何百万という命が奪われ、街は血で染まった。フォン・ヴァランシウスの財宝が奪われた後、人類に対する裏切り者の住居は衛星からサイクロン・トルピードで爆撃された。かつて栄華を誇っていた惑星は失われた。
languages.original_text: Dargonus was subjected to horrific pillaging, millions were put to death, and blood ran through the streets. After the von Valancius treasures were stolen, the abode of the traitor to Humanity was bombed with cyclonic torpedoes from orbit. The once glorious world was lost.

traits.locale_text: ダルゴナスは恐ろしい略奪に見舞われていた。何百万という命が奪われ、街は血で染まった。フォン・ヴァランシウスの財宝が奪われた後、人類に対する裏切り者の住居は衛星からサイクロン・トルピードで爆撃された。かつて栄華を誇っていた惑星は失われた。

languages.text: Dargonus fut la proie de pillages horribles, des millions de gens furent mis à mort et le sang coula dans les rues. Une fois les trésors des von Valancius volés, la demeure {mf|du traître|de la traîtresse} de l'humanité fut bombardée avec des torpilles cycloniques depuis l'espace. Le monde autrefois glorieux n'existait plus.
languages.original_text: Dargonus was subjected to horrific pillaging, millions were put to death, and blood ran through the streets. After the von Valancius treasures were stolen, the abode of the traitor to Humanity was bombed with cyclonic torpedoes from orbit. The once glorious world was lost.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus fut la proie de pillages horribles, des millions de gens furent mis à mort et le sang coula dans les rues. Une fois les trésors des von Valancius volés, la demeure {mf|du traître|de la traîtresse} de l'humanité fut bombardée avec des torpilles cycloniques depuis l'espace. Le monde autrefois glorieux n'existait plus.

languages.text: Dargonus sufrió un saqueo horrible: millones de sus habitantes murieron y ríos de sangre fluyeron por las calles. Después de haber robado los tesoros de von Valancius, se bombardeó el hogar de{mf|l| la} traidor{mf||a} a la Humanidad con torpedos ciclónicos desde la órbita. El mundo, otrora glorioso, quedó destruido.
languages.original_text: Dargonus was subjected to horrific pillaging, millions were put to death, and blood ran through the streets. After the von Valancius treasures were stolen, the abode of the traitor to Humanity was bombed with cyclonic torpedoes from orbit. The once glorious world was lost.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus sufrió un saqueo horrible: millones de sus habitantes murieron y ríos de sangre fluyeron por las calles. Después de haber robado los tesoros de von Valancius, se bombardeó el hogar de{mf|l| la} traidor{mf||a} a la Humanidad con torpedos ciclónicos desde la órbita. El mundo, otrora glorioso, quedó destruido.

languages.text: Dargonus wurde rücksichtslos geplündert, Millionen starben, und die Straßen waren voller Blut. Nachdem die Schätze derer von Valancius gestohlen worden waren, wurde das Reich {mf|des Verräters|der Verräterin} an der Menschheit mit Zyklonentorpedos aus dem Orbit bombardiert. Die einstmals so ruhmreiche Welt war verloren.
languages.original_text: Dargonus was subjected to horrific pillaging, millions were put to death, and blood ran through the streets. After the von Valancius treasures were stolen, the abode of the traitor to Humanity was bombed with cyclonic torpedoes from orbit. The once glorious world was lost.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus wurde rücksichtslos geplündert, Millionen starben, und die Straßen waren voller Blut. Nachdem die Schätze derer von Valancius gestohlen worden waren, wurde das Reich {mf|des Verräters|der Verräterin} an der Menschheit mit Zyklonentorpedos aus dem Orbit bombardiert. Die einstmals so ruhmreiche Welt war verloren.

languages.text: Dargonus; korkunç yağmalara maruz kaldı, milyonlarca insan ölüme terk edildi ve sokaklar kan gölüne döndü. İnsanlığa ihanet eden Hür Tacir'in yuvası, von Valancius hazineleri çalındıktan sonra yörüngeden atılan siklonik torpidolarla bombalandı. Bir zamanların görkemli dünyası artık ölüydü.
languages.original_text: Dargonus was subjected to horrific pillaging, millions were put to death, and blood ran through the streets. After the von Valancius treasures were stolen, the abode of the traitor to Humanity was bombed with cyclonic torpedoes from orbit. The once glorious world was lost.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus korkunç yağmalara maruz kaldı, milyonlarca insan ölüme terk edildi ve sokaklar kan gölüne döndü. İnsanlığa ihanet eden Hür Tacir'in yuvası, von Valancius hazineleri çalındıktan sonra yörüngeden atılan siklonik torpidolarla bombalandı. Bir zamanların görkemli dünyası kaybedilmişti.
